welcome.page.introduction.title: Thank you for choosing Cloudflare
welcome.page.introduction.message: Our global network is designed to make everything you connect to the Internet secure, private, fast, and reliable.
welcome.page.get_started.message: Get started by adding your website or application to Cloudflare, or explore our developer, zero trust, and network security products.
welcome.page.brand_value.title: A global network built for the cloud
welcome.page.brand_value.message: Connect to or build on top of the Cloudflare network for unparalleled security, performance, and reliability.
experiment.welcome.page.introduction.mes: Let's make your website or app fast & secure
experiment.welcome.page.introduction.sub: Connect your domain to start sending web traffic through Cloudflare.
experiment.welcome.page.dev_platform.tit: Build apps on our developer platform
experiment.welcome.page.dev_platform.sub: Deploy fast and secure apps globally, leaving infrastructure hassles to Cloudflare.
experiment.welcome.page.cf_one.title: Secure your corporate network
experiment.welcome.page.cf_one.subtitle: Replace legacy security perimeters with our global network, making the Internet faster and safer for global teams.
